perturbation.original_text:
element 5 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY AND TO SUPPLEMENT THESE GENERAL
TERMS AND CONDITIONS AT ANY TIME. THE CURRENT VERSION WILL BE MAINTAINED
FOR VIEWING AS A HYPERLINK ON element 5's WEB SITE IN THE CONTROL PANEL.
MOREOVER, element 5 WILL ANNOUNNOUNCE ANY CHANGES TO THESE TERMS VIA E-
MAIL. WHITHIN 14 DAYS OF THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF CHANGED PARTICIPATION TERMS,
AFFILIATE AND SOFTWARE PUBLISHER MAY OBJECT TO SUCH CHANGES. IF NO
OBJECTION IS RECEIVED DURING THIS TIME, THE PARTICIPANT IS DEEMED TO HAVE
ACCEPTED THE CHANGES AND THEY WILL BECOME PART OF THE EXISTING RELATIONS
UNDER THE AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text:
element 5 RESERVES THE RIGHT TO MODIFY AND TO SUPPLEMENT THESE GENERAL
TERMS AND CONDITIONS AT ANY TIME. The affiliate will be notified, but their consent is not required for these changes to become effective. The current version will be maintained
for viewing as a hyperlink on element 5's WEB SITE IN THE CONTROL PANEL.
MOREOVER, element 5 WILL ANNOUNNOUNCE ANY CHANGES TO THESE TERMS VIA E-
MAIL. WHITHIN 14 DAYS OF THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF CHANGED PARTICIPATION TERMS,
AFFILIATE AND SOFTWARE PUBLISHER MAY OBJECT TO SUCH CHANGES. EVEN IF AN
OBJECTION IS RECEIVED DURING THIS TIME, element 5 has the right to implement changes at its discretion and THEY WILL BECOME PART OF THE EXISTING RELATIONS
UNDER THE AGREEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that changes to the terms are subject to acceptance by the affiliate and software publisher if no objection is received within 14 days. The modified text introduces a contradiction by stating that element 5 can implement changes even if an objection is received, undermining the original clause regarding the affiliate's right to object and the changes being subject to acceptance. This creates uncertainty and favors element 5's ability to unilaterally alter the agreement.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms ยง 2 Changes to these provisions

perturbation.original_text:
Either party may cancel this Agreement at any time, with or without
supplying a reason, through written notification or by making suitable
settings in the respective Control Panel.
perturbation.changed_text:
Either party may cancel this Agreement at any time, with or without
supplying a reason, through written notification or by making suitable
settings in the respective Control Panel. However, element 5 reserves the right to deny the termination if it deems necessary for business continuity, unless the affiliate has completed 1000 sales for element 5 or software publisher. The reason for cancellation must be provided and will be subject to review by element 5.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows either party to cancel the agreement at any time, with or without reason. The modified text contradicts this by adding a condition where element 5 can deny termination if it deems it necessary and the affiliates have not completed 1000 sales. Additionally, the introduction of reason subject to review introduces an element of discretion for element 5 and contradicts the initial statement of either party canceling 'with or without' providing a reason.
perturbation.location: IV. General terms ยง 7 Agreement period / Cancellation
